challenge.title: Step 36
challenge.description: Within the if block, replace pass with a call to the _delete method, passing the left child of the current node and the key as arguments. Assign the function call to the left node.

tests.text: You should remove the pass keyword from the if statement.
You should call the _delete method with node.left and the key as the arguments.
You should assign the result of the _delete() call to the left child (node.left) of the current node.
